Title(s): ‘Consail and Teiching at the Vys Man gaif his Sone’
Subjects: instruction, father to son; advice, moral
_description: ‘Consail and Teiching at the Vys Man gaif his Sone’ — 456 lines in couplets

CULKk15.First Lines:
Qwhay takes Plesans In ȝouthageOff gud and Ill to have
                    knawleg…
CULKk15.Last Lines:
…al thus the wysman taucht his sonneAnd bad hyme at It suld be
                    donne
CULKk15.Attributed Title:
here efter folowis þe consail & teiching at the vys man gaif his
                    sonne (f. 42v)
